@louisesdad @SecEd_Education Its one thing COVID bringing fundamental changes to social relationships, but I would want to challenge why it would fundamentally alter the basis of professional relationships between a professional person (like a teacher) and their client (like a pupil).

@louisesdad @SecEd_Education It's an interesting point about whether employment contracts have more ethical standing than professional codes of conduct and practice. That debate goes to the heart of what defines a profession I think.
@louisesdad @SecEd_Education The restrictions of COVID are obviously very serious but short term. In the article, I'm talking about the guiding principles of a fundamental professional value.
